title: Building Up
creator: James E. D. Cline
description: Science fiction novel, of the high tech type, in which construction and first use of the anchored tether space elevator, the Centristation wet-launch of the classical wheel-type space station in ow earth orbit, and a KESTS (kinetic energy supported transportation structure) between ground and geostationary earth orbit, are built. Also book contains two short stories and extensive technical background.
subject: science fiction
KESTS
space elevator
Centristation
